text: Haeba batho ba babeli har’a Ba-kholoang ba loants’ana, aha khotso lipakeng tsa bona; empa haeba e mongo a bona a tlola meeli khahlanong le e mong, kahoo mo loants’eng bohle ea tlolang meeli ho fihlela a boela molaong oa Allah; Empa ha a sala molao morao, ahang khotso lipakeng tsa bona ka toaka, le hloke ts’ekamelo
